name: Lemon Pudding-Pound Cake
author: Ramona Glastetter

ingredients.name: pkg. (2 layer size) yellow cake mix
(3 3/4 or 3 5/8 oz.) pkg. instant lemon pudding

instructions: Beat eggs until thick and lemon-colored. Add cake mix, pudding (dry), water, and oil: beat at medium speed, 10 minutes. Pour into ungreased 10-inch tube pan with removable bottom. Bake at 350Â° about 50 minutes. Remove hot cake, on pan bottom, from pan. Using a 2-tined fork, prick holes in top of cake: drizzle glaze over top and spread on sides of cake. For Glaze: Combine lemon juice and confectioners sugar; heat to boiling.
